channel.title: Tales from Kleenex®
channel.itunes:subtitle: Exciting stories for kids from Kleenex Anti Viral
channel.itunes:author: Kleenex
channel.itunes:summary: Three wonderful children's stories beautifully narrated by Simon Callow. Be thrilled by tales of brave heroes, huge giants, valiant knights, beautiful princesses and nasty villains!
channel.description: The tales for kids in this channel are lots of fun! Listen and be captivated by the thrilling tales of brave heroes,huge giants,fearless knights, beautiful princesses and nasty villains!

item.title: The Fearless Ranger
item.itunes:author: Simon Callow
item.itunes:subtitle: The exciting tale of The Fearless Ranger
item.itunes:summary: The Fearless Ranger is an exciting tale about the fight to protect the people of the town from a wicked creature lurking in the forest. This episode is brought to you by Kleenex Anti Viral

item.title: The Giant and The Archers
item.itunes:author: Simon Callow
item.itunes:subtitle: The story of the evil Giant and the brave Archers who must save the town from his evil.
item.itunes:summary: Can the brave archers save the town from the Giant? Listen to this exciting story to find out what happened. This episode is brought to you by Kleenex Anti Viral

item.title: The Poorly Princess
item.itunes:author: Simon Callow
item.itunes:subtitle: The tale of the Princess cursed by the cold and nasty Winter Spirit and the three brave Knights who try to defeat him.
item.itunes:summary: Who can save the Princess from the cold and evil Winter Spirit? Listen to this exciting story to find out what happened. This episode is brought to you by Kleenex Anti Viral
